uvi.product_version: versions from v5.4.126 to before v5.4.134
uvi.description:
scsi: core: Fix bad pointer dereference when ehandler kthread is invalid

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.134 by commit 887bfae2732b5b02a86a859fd239d34f7ff93c05, it was introduced in version v5.4.126 by commit 79296e292d67fa7b5fb8d8c27343683e823872c8. For more details please see the references link.
